    Salt API client.

      • login

        public Token login(String username,
                   String password,
                   AuthModule eauth)
            throws SaltException
        Perform login and return the token.

        POST /login

        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        eauth - the eauth type
        Returns:
        the authentication token
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

                                String password,
                                AuthModule eauth)

        username - the username
        password - the password
        eauth - the eauth type
        Returns:
        Future containing the authentication token

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
               throws SaltException
        Perform logout and clear the session token from the config.

        POST /logout

        Returns:
        true if the logout was successful, otherwise false
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • logoutAsync

        public Future<Boolean> logoutAsync()
        Asynchronously perform logout and clear the session token from the config.

        POST /logout

        Returns:
        Future containing a boolean result, true if logout was successful

      • getMinions

        public Map<String,Map<String,Object>> getMinions()
                                          throws SaltException
        Query for all minions and immediately return a map of minions keyed by minion id.

        GET /minions

        Returns:
        map containing maps representing minions, keyed by minion id
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong
        See Also:
        Grains

      • getMinionsAsync

        public Future<Map<String,Map<String,Object>>> getMinionsAsync()
                                                       throws SaltException
        Asynchronously query for all minions and return a map of minions keyed by minion id.

        GET /minions

        Returns:
        Future with a map containing maps representing minions, keyed by minion id
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong
        See Also:
        Grains

      • getMinionDetails

        public Map<String,Object> getMinionDetails(String minionId)
                                    throws SaltException
        Query for details (grains) of the specified minion.

        GET /minions/<minion-id>

        Parameters:
        minionId - the minion ID
        Returns:
        Map key: grain name, value: grain value
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong
        See Also:
        Grains

        Parameters:
        minionId - the minion ID

      • startCommand

        public <T> ScheduledJob startCommand(Target<T> target,
                                     String function,
                                     List<Object> args,
                                     Map<String,Object> kwargs)
                              throws SaltException
        Generic interface to start any execution command and immediately return an object representing the scheduled job.

        POST /minions

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the tgt property for this command
        Parameters:
        target - the target
        function - the function to execute
        args - list of non-keyword arguments
        kwargs - map containing keyword arguments
        Returns:
        object representing the scheduled job
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

        T - type of the tgt property for this command
        Parameters:
        target - the target
        function - the function to execute
        args - list of non-keyword arguments
        kwargs - map containing keyword arguments
        Returns:

      • run

        public <T> Map<String,Object> run(String username,
                                  String password,
                                  AuthModule eauth,
                                  String client,
                                  Target<T> target,
                                  String function,
                                  List<Object> args,
                                  Map<String,Object> kwargs)
                           throws SaltException
        Generic interface to start any execution command bypassing normal session handling.

        POST /run

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the tgt property for this command
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        eauth - the eauth type
        client - the client
        target - the target
        function - the function to execute
        args - list of non-keyword arguments
        kwargs - map containing keyword arguments
        Returns:
        Map key: minion id, value: command result from that minion
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • runRawSSHCommand

        public <T> Map<String,Result<SSHRawResult>> runRawSSHCommand(String command,
                                                             Target<T> target,
                                                             SaltSSHConfig cfg)
                                                      throws SaltException
        Calls salt-ssh with a command in raw shell mode (commands bypass Salt and gets executed as shell commands).
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the tgt property for this command
        Parameters:
        command - to be executed
        target - glob type, targets to be reached by the command
        cfg - SaltSSH config holder
        Returns:
        a map in which every key is a host associated to the result of the raw command
        Throws:
        SaltException

      • runAsync

        public <T> Future<Map<String,Object>> runAsync(String username,
                                               String password,
                                               AuthModule eauth,
                                               String client,
                                               Target<T> target,
                                               String function,
                                               List<Object> args,
                                               Map<String,Object> kwargs)
        Asynchronously start any execution command bypassing normal session handling.

        POST /run

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the tgt property for this command
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        eauth - the eauth type
        client - the client
        target - the target
        function - the function to execute
        args - list of non-keyword arguments
        kwargs - map containing keyword arguments
        Returns:
        Future containing Map key: minion id, value: command result from that minion

        GET /keys

        Returns:
        the keys
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

        public Future<Key.Names> keysAsync()
        Asynchronously query general key information.

        Required permissions: @wheel

        GET /keys

        Returns:
        Future containing the keys

      • events

        public EventStream events(EventListener... listeners)
                   throws SaltException
        Returns a WebSocket @ClientEndpoint annotated object connected to the /ws ServerEndpoint.

        The stream object supports the EventStream interface which allows the caller to register/unregister for stream event notifications as well as close the event stream.

        Note: login(String, String, AuthModule) or loginAsync(String, String, AuthModule) must be called prior to calling this method.

        GET /events

        Parameters:
        listeners - event listeners to be added before the stream is initialized
        Returns:
        the event stream
        Throws:
        SaltException - in case of an error during websocket stream initialization

      • sendEvent

        public boolean sendEvent(String eventTag,
                         String eventData)
                  throws SaltException
        Trigger an event in Salt with the specified tag and data.

        POST /hook

        Parameters:
        eventTag - the event tag
        eventData - the event data. Must be valid JSON.
        Returns:
        the boolean value returned by Salt. If true the event was triggered successfully. A value of false is returned only if Salt itself returns false; it does not mean a communication failure.
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • sendEventAsync

        public Future<Boolean> sendEventAsync(String eventTag,
                                      String eventData)
        Asynchronously trigger an event in Salt with the specified tag and data.

        POST /hook

        Parameters:
        eventTag - the event tag
        eventData - the event data. Must be valid JSON.
        Returns:
        Future containing a boolean value indicating the success or failure of triggering the event.

      • call

        public <R> R call(Call<?> call,
                  Client client,
                  String endpoint,
                  Optional<Map<String,Object>> custom,
                  com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken<R> type)
           throws SaltException
        Generic interface to make a Call to an endpoint using a given Client.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the object type that will be returned
        Parameters:
        call - the call
        client - the client to use
        endpoint - the endpoint
        custom - map of arguments
        type - return type as a TypeToken
        Returns:
        the result of the call
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong

      • call

        public <R> R call(Call<?> call,
                  Client client,
                  String endpoint,
                  com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken<R> type)
           throws SaltException
        Convenience method to make a call without arguments.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the object type that will be returned
        Parameters:
        call - the call
        client - the client to use
        endpoint - the endpoint
        type - return type as a TypeToken
        Returns:
        the result of the call
        Throws:
        SaltException - if anything goes wrong
